Comment: Interesting and valid points. However, it is good to start investing even with a few thousand in order to gain experience and lessons from the stock market
and make sure the 6 month salary tuck away is also generating interest, instead of chilling out in saving account.

People don't understand that investing is a long term commitment. A lot around me gave up DCA cos they couldn't see the outcome they had initially hoped for. I gladly took over their units though ðŸ˜‚

I strongly recommend the blue chip investment plans from OCBC. Or other similar ones from the local banks.   If you are putting the money aside now to invest, why not let it start investing immediately. To make full use of the low processing fee you should go with at least a thousand a month but 500 is also a good start.   It builds fast.
i always tot is buying big on Bitcoins.  Even ppl i met in gym ask me to at least buy a little.
I started with $5k I didn't wait - there's an added advantage of learning early while only small amounts are thrown around
BK Lim this is very true
